cards.description:
Double this card's Gold or gain 2 Gold and remove this card from your deck.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Coward Form
cards.description:
thethorton:Run.
At the start of your turn, thethorton:Run.

cards.name: Crashing Stocks
cards.description: If you have at least 100 Gold, lose 100 Gold and deal 50 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Demotion
cards.description:
ALL enemies cannot buff themselves or debuff you.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dodge & Roll & Run
cards.description:
Gain 9 (11) Block.
Next turn, gain 9 (11) Block.
thethorton:Run.

cards.name: Escape!
cards.description:
33% chance to escape a non-boss combat.
~~- Receive no rewards. -~~
thethorton:Run.
Exhaustive 2.

cards.name: Fair Trade
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card.
Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fatigue
cards.description:
Apply Weak equal to your held Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Golden Petal
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Card rewards from this combat are Rare cards from any class.
Fleeting (Exhaust).

cards.name: Good Fortune
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, deal X times 5 damage to ALL enemies.
Refund 1 (2).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hexaghostify
cards.description:
Grave.
Enemy (ALL) becomes (enemies) a (become) Hexaghost (Hexaghosts).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Just Business
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust ALL your cards.
Choose an Intent at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Loan
cards.description:
Upon pickup, gain 300 Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Message From Our Sponsors
cards.description:
Unplayable (Ethereal).
Thanks (Cost) for (cannot) playing (be) for (modified.)
so (Obtain) long! (a) No (Relic.)
longer offering mod commissions (Exhaust).~~-  I'm working on bigger projects now! -~~

cards.name: Midnight Strike
cards.description:
Can only be played if you have played exactly 11 cards this combat.
Deal 100 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Penny Toss
cards.description:
Gain 11 Gold.
Gain 11 Block.
Deal 11 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Portfolio
cards.description:
Gain 20 (25) Gold.
Shuffle 2  (upgraded ) thethorton:Business_Cards and an  (upgraded ) thethorton:Investment into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Scaling Is Win
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Strength ( and draw 1 additional card).

cards.name: Sell Short
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Add 1 copy of a card in your hand to your deck permanently.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shifting Octopus
cards.description:
Do 2 (3) things.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Summon Profits
cards.description:
Add 1 random card from any color into your hand.
Draw 1 card.
 (They cost 0 until played.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Temporal Blast
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Play a copy of the next card you play this turn at the start of the next combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: You're Fired
cards.description:
Deal 20 (26) damage.
Remove all of your debuffs.

relics.name: Chemical Blood
relics.description: Every time you lose HP equal to 25% of your max HP, gain a random potion.
relics.flavorText: Easily flammable.

relics.name: Empty Skull
relics.description: Whenever you play the last remaining card in your hand, shuffle an Inspiration into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: The skull of a once great, empty-headed Philosopher.

relics.name: Enhanced Actuators
relics.description: Gain 1 Strength for every 2 orb slots.
relics.flavorText: Big actuators... equal big... gains?

relics.name: Hidden Compartment
relics.description: At the start of each combat, remove a card from your draw pile. The first time you shuffle your draw pile, add this card into your hand.
relics.flavorText: There is no shame in deception.

relics.name: Pocket Mushroom
relics.description: The first time you take unblocked attack damage each combat, deal 12 damage back.
relics.flavorText: A Mushroom concealed in your skirt in case of danger.

relics.name: Trusty Knives
relics.description: Whenever you lose a Knife, gain 1 Protection.
relics.flavorText: It would be embarrassing if you were to cut yourself.

relics.name: Vile Toxins
relics.description: Poison deals 4 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: It bubbles menacingly.

relics.name: Faulty Coupler
relics.description: Every 5th orb that is channeled will aspiration:Fuse with a copy of a currently channeled orb.
relics.flavorText: ... Loneliness is... the enemy...

relics.name: Fetid Barrel
relics.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, apply 1 Poison to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Even the tightly sealed interior cannot contain the pungent smell.

relics.name: Frozen Jewel
relics.description: At the end of your turn, gain 2 Block for every enemy that intends to attack. Gain Blur if there are multiple enemies and all intend to attack.
relics.flavorText: In your numb embrace, it pulses with comforting energy.

relics.name: Hummingbird Heart
relics.description: For the first 2 turns of combat, receive 50% less damage from attacks.
relics.flavorText: A thousand beats a minute, the power of your heart is incredible but wanes fast.

relics.name: Sea Salt Ice Cream
relics.description:
Upon pickup, store a copy of one of your relics and obtain the relic you previously stored.

Previously stored:
Circlet
relics.flavorText: Bonds forged by the heart can never be broken.

relics.name: Anachronic Snail Shell
relics.description: Store up to 6 unblocked damage taken from enemies until the end of your next turn.
relics.flavorText: This piece of a snail's shell resists the flow of time, tumbling along at its own paradoxical pace.

relics.name: Hat of Infinite Power
relics.description: During the first two turns of combat, all Powers are free.
relics.flavorText: It's brimming with energy as if powered by one thousand explosions!

relics.name: Mysterious Core
relics.description: At the end of every even-numbered turn, Channel 1 random orb.
relics.flavorText: Secondary systems have reported anamalous charge generation. Observation recommended.

relics.name: Snecko Tail
relics.description: Whenever you play a poison-related card, apply 1 Dizzy to the target(s).
relics.flavorText: The tail of a fearsome Snecko. The fluids it secretes are excellent for transferring your toxins.

relics.name: The D6
relics.description: Right click to activate.Reroll all Relic and Potion rewards in the current reward screen. Works 6 times.
relics.flavorText: Destiny, but a dice roll away.

relics.name: Art of War (read)
relics.description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an additional [E] and attacks deal double damage next turn.
relics.flavorText: This ancient manuscript contains wisdom from a past age. You've taken it's teachings to heart.

relics.name: Baby Byrd
relics.description:
Teach your little companion about your tools of trade and he'll repay you in kind.

(It does something at the start of battle once you have amassed enough charges.)
relics.flavorText: For better or for worse, you've decided that this untainted creature deserves a better life.

relics.name: Headhunter
relics.description: Gain Charges after killing a monster, gain a set of buffs at the start of battle depending on the amount of stored Charges. Visiting non-monster rooms makes Charges decay based on the type of room. Right-click to see more information.
relics.flavorText: A belt of severed heads, the first step on the path of exiling yourself from this place of the damned.

relics.name: Lifesprig
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain [E] next turn.
relics.flavorText: From the weakest slime to the strongest abomination, hostile life thrives in the spire. Maybe, so can you.

relics.name: Nothing
relics.description: Does nothing.
relics.flavorText: I told you so.

relics.name: Ritual Stick
relics.description: The first time you lose HP each combat, gain 1 Ritual.
relics.flavorText: If only you could express yourself better.

relics.name: Stabinomicon
relics.description: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply 2 Grievous πWounds to the target.
relics.flavorText: "How do you reach a heart? With a knife." - Blizzarre, runic archmagus

relics.name: Bard's Skillbook
relics.description:
Each card you play may also bard:Queue bard:Notes. At the end of your turn, bard:Queue a [WildNote].

Multiclass Bard
relics.flavorText: A notebook used as a book for notes.

relics.name: Beaked's Skillbook
relics.description:
At the start of each turn, if you only played attacks last turn, gain 1 Strength and heal HP equal to your Strength.

Multiclass Beaked
relics.flavorText: These religious texts depict the awakening of the "Chosen One" before devolving into nonesense.

relics.name: Burster Core
relics.description: Replaces Cracked Core. Whenever an Orb is evoked by channeling with no empty slots, that Orb is evoked twice.
relics.flavorText: Goes off vigorously when filled to the brim.

relics.name: Defect's Skillbook
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, gain 2 Orb slots and Channel that many random Orbs.
Whenever you play a Power, Channel a random Orb at the start of your turn for 3 turns.

Multiclass Defect
relics.flavorText: Pages upon pages filled with meticulously written 1s and 0s, what could this mean?

relics.name: Future Diary
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
At the start of each turn a random card in your hand is picked. You cannot play other cards while that card is in your hand.
relics.flavorText: It's hard to live in the present if your future is in your hand.

relics.name: Ironclad's Skillbook
relics.description:
Before the start of your turn, if you have Block, gain 1 Strength. At the end of combat, heal 4 HP.

Multiclass Ironclad
relics.flavorText: An abused book that contains the hasty scribbles of an angry being.

relics.name: Mageblood
relics.description:
You cannot use potions. You cannot have rare potions.
At the start of combat, gain all your potion effects.
relics.flavorText: Rivers of power course through your veins.

relics.name: Marisa's Skillbook
relics.description:
Whenever you play a card, gain Charge-up equal to its cost+#b1.

Multiclass Marisa
relics.flavorText: A handwritten tome written by an ordinary, human witch. She must like mushrooms.

relics.name: Mechanical Eye
relics.description: At the start of the first 3 turns each combat, put a card from your draw pile into your hand.
relics.flavorText: 20/20 Hindsight.

relics.name: Mobile Forge
relics.description: Whenever you play an upgraded card, runesmith:Enhance a random card in your hand. Whenever you play an enhanced card, Upgrade a random card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: A pet-like machine that started to follow you on your journey.

relics.name: Poet's Pen
relics.description: Whenever you play an Attack, play the top card of your draw pile if it's an Attack, otherwise discard it.
relics.flavorText: In every piece of prose, lies a tiny spark of magic. With this tool, you may craft beauty even on this most dreary of canvasses.

relics.name: Poet's Pen
relics.description:
Whenever you play an Attack, play the top card of your draw pile.
Start combat with 6 stacks of Weak, Frail and Vulnerable on you, reduced by Experience.
relics.flavorText: In every piece of prose, lies a tiny spark of magic. With this tool, you may craft beauty even on this most dreary of canvasses.

relics.name: Random Nob Generator
relics.description: Gain [E] [E] at the start of each turn. At the start of each combat, spawn a Gremlin Nob 40% of the time.
relics.flavorText: We spent so much time to see if we could, we didn't think about if we should.

relics.name: Ritual Dagger
relics.description: Lose 3 HP at the start of your turn. When you would die in combat, heal to your Max HP instead and gain permanently Awoken (works once).
relics.flavorText: With every move you make, you feel the dagger dig in deeper into your being. You fear what you may become if you give in.

relics.name: Runesmith's Skillbook
relics.description:
The first time you play an Attack each turn, for each prior turn ended without playing an Attack, runesmith:Enhance that many random cards in your hand that amount of times.

Multiclass Runesmith
relics.flavorText: This seems to be a beginners guide to arcane forgery. The hammer section has been taken special care of.

relics.name: Runic Spoon
relics.description: In each combat, add a copy of every 3rd card you manually play into your hand, it costs 1 more until played.
relics.flavorText: Maybe you could read the runes if the spoon didn't wiggle around so much.

relics.name: Secret Technique Scroll
relics.description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card. Whenever you shuffle your discard pile, add 3 random cards to your draw pile. They cost 0 until played.
relics.flavorText: "Promise me you'll never use these" - Teacher

relics.name: Servant's Skillbook
relics.description:
At the start of each turn, if you took no HP damage last turn, gain 3 Sattelites. Whenever a Sattelite is used, gain Protection equal to its damage.

Multiclass Servant
relics.flavorText: An elegant list on how to clean a... mansion? graces these pages.

relics.name: Silent's Skillbook
relics.description:
Whenever you play 4 or more cards on your turn, at the start of your next turn, discard any number of cards then draw that many.

Multiclass Silent
relics.flavorText: Pages filled with information on how to deal with this place. A talk with the author should be enlightening.

relics.name: Stellarator
relics.description: The first time each turn when channeling an orb fills your orb slots, aspiration:Fuse all orbs.
relics.flavorText: Who needs the Inserter if you can just squeeze!

relics.name: Watcher's Skillbook
relics.description:
Whenever you play an Attack and then a Skill or vice versa, gain 1 Mantra.

Multiclass Watcher
relics.flavorText: These pages just seem to have a bunch of random indentations...

relics.name: Earplugs
relics.description: Whenever you would gain bard:Inspiration, apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable for every 25 inspiration to a random enemy instead.
relics.flavorText: Faith in ones skills is always useful in one way or another.

relics.name: Kaom's Heart
relics.description: Raise your Max HP by 100 and become unable to obtain new relics FOR THE ENTIRE RUN.
relics.flavorText: The warrior who fears, will fail. Never look back. Never stop. Never surrender.

relics.name: Nostalgia
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain a random Starter Relic.
relics.flavorText: Take heart in the memory of those that came before.

relics.name: Sky's Mirror
relics.description: Put the first card played each turn onto the bottom of the draw pile.
relics.flavorText: The sky you see is limited; look here, instead.

relics.name: Telescope
relics.description: At the start of combat, increase the Stellar Phase by 4.
relics.flavorText: The lens is cracked, but it's still valuable for the memories.

relics.name: Universal Mirror
relics.description: Put cards played onto the bottom of the draw pile.
relics.flavorText: It reflects everything.

relics.name: Carapace
relics.description: Start each combat with 2 Plated Armor.
relics.flavorText: Your armor is appealing.

relics.name: Green Skull
relics.description: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 4 additional Plated Armor.
relics.flavorText: A small skull collected from fallen ascenders.

relics.name: Non-Newtonian Flesh
relics.description: If you lost HP during the previous turn, gain Block equal to half your Plated Armor at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: "Most curious! It appears to gain enormous viscosity upon being struck!" - Ranwid

relics.name: Pit of Fury
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP, gain 2 temporary Strength.
relics.flavorText: This seed is just so angry.

relics.name: Preserved Parasite
relics.description: Enemies in non-elite and non-boss encounters have 20% less HP
relics.flavorText: The parasite seems to create a shrinking aura that targets particularly normal enemies.

relics.name: Start Codon
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 additional [E] for each Innate card in your deck
relics.flavorText: This piece of genetic information tells the avocado to just 'go'.

relics.name: Suck Dummy
relics.description: Whenever you heal HP during combat, heal 2 additional HP
relics.flavorText: It's been sucked on

relics.name: Tungsten Plate
relics.description: Reduce all Plated Armor losses due to Peel by 1.
relics.flavorText: It's rly heavy.

relics.name: Mark of Nausea
relics.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle 3 Slimeds into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: This brand is used to signify parasites who have mastered nausea.

relics.name: Sturdy Carapace
relics.description: Replaces Carapace. Start each combat with 2 Plated Armor. The first time you Peel each turn, gain 2 Metallicize.
relics.flavorText: Your armor is extremely appealing.

relics.name: Twisted Tendril
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 3 Constricted to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: It stretches and twists interminably, searching for anything to grab on to.

relics.name: Communication Chip
relics.description: Future card rewards have 1 additional common card to choose from.
relics.flavorText: There's gotta be something that explains why there's a sociopath outside of the Spire who is constantly broadcasting common cards.

relics.name: Buffer Solution
relics.description: Whenever you obtain a potion, trigger its effect.
relics.flavorText: Mimics fire potions by containing flammable liquid.

relics.name: Ceramic Flower
relics.description: Whenever you add a curse into your deck, gain 25 Gold.
relics.flavorText: Non-Fungible.

relics.name: Holographic Fish
relics.description: Whenever you add a colourless card into your deck, gain 13 Gold.
relics.flavorText: The memory of the fish from the future still gives you money.

relics.name: Looking Glass
relics.description: Whenever you play a card, Scry 1.
relics.flavorText: I think I've seen enough of the future to know where this is going.

relics.name: Sleeping Pills
relics.description: Upon pickup, remove 2 random cards from your deck.
relics.flavorText: What was I doing again?

relics.name: Bottled Bottled Bottle
relics.description: Upon pickup, give ALL cards in your deck Innate.
relics.flavorText: Now you have ALL the bottles!

relics.name: Bottled Elixir
relics.description: At the start of each combat, you may exhaust any number of cards to gain that much [E] .
relics.flavorText: The liquid level doesn't raise by a bit when you throw cards into it.

relics.name: Sandpaper
relics.description: Start each combat with 4 Strength if your deck has no Attacks.
relics.flavorText: What am I supposed to sharpen exactly?

relics.name: The Prism
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 5 cards from a pool of 6 cards from each colour to add to your deck and obtain Prismatic Shard.
relics.flavorText: Quit blinding me with that.

relics.name: Ancient Scroll
relics.description: Upon pickup, add 5 colourless cards into your deck.
relics.flavorText: It's empty. Of course it's empty.

relics.name: Bag Pipes
relics.description: Each card you play may also bard:Queue bard:Notes. The bard:Notes bard:Queued depend on the type of the card played and are shown in the card's tooltips.
relics.flavorText: Your trusty instrument and weapon.

relics.name: Pitch Pipe
relics.description: At the start of each combat, bard:Queue a [BuffNote].
relics.flavorText: Stay in tune.

relics.name: Oil Painting
relics.description: Start each combat with bard:Inspiration 100.
relics.flavorText: This painting depicts a group of people standing on a stage together. They feel oddly familiar to you.

relics.name: Strange Harp
relics.description: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Weak or Vulnerable it has to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: Every note played on this harp sounds eerie.

relics.name: Coral Orchestra
relics.description: Every 5th bard:Melody you perform is performed twice.

relics.name: Echo Chamber
relics.description: At the start of each combat, perform the last bard:Melody performed in the previous combat.

relics.name: Magic Tuning Fork
relics.description: At the start of your turn, bard:Queue a [WildNote].
relics.flavorText: A memento of your past life. Rings with the sound of a constantly changing note.

relics.name: Deep Vero
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Clear your Note Queue at the end of each turn.

relics.name: Self-Playing Flute
relics.description:
Replaces Pitch Pipe.
At the start of each combat, bard:Queue 2 [WildNote].
relics.flavorText: A magical flute, enchanted to play songs on its own.

relics.name: Conductor's Baton
relics.description: Your Note Queue can hold 2 additional bard:Notes.
relics.flavorText: Beatings will continue until the music improves.

relics.name: Alphabet Soup
relics.description: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 cards that start with a certain letter to add into your hand. Whenever you play a card that starts with that letter, gain 4 Block and [E] .
relics.flavorText: Letterlicious.

relics.name: Armorer's Headpiece
relics.description: You feel more talkative and start combat with 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Part of the Flock!

relics.name: Bucket Of Slime
relics.description: The first time you play each card in your deck each combat, gain 1 Block.
relics.flavorText: A bucket of slime! Useful and multipurpose! Huh? What purpose? I'm just a salesman, figure that out yourself.

relics.name: Cardboard Heart
relics.description: When obtained, picks 3 random cards. Choose 1 of 3 of the set to add into your hand with Retain each combat.
relics.flavorText: Slain adventurer's decks form this lump of fibrous board.

relics.name: Cleric's Blessing
relics.description: While in the Battle Tower, at the start of each combat, gain 2 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: That guy sure is friendly.

relics.name: Cultist War Banner
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 1 Ritual and lose 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Caw? Caw Caw! Caw. caw.

relics.name: Cursed Doll
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP, ALL enemies also lose twice that much HP.
relics.flavorText: It's filled with pins and needles . . . and it looks surprisingly like you.

relics.name: Dijinn Lamp
relics.description: At the start of combat, shuffle a Wish Granted into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: As you rub it, you can feel the faintest echoes of infinite power.

relics.name: Gorgon Head
relics.description: The first time each combat that each enemy intends to attack you multiple times in a turn, it loses 1 temporary Strength.
relics.flavorText: Still dangerous to look at.

relics.name: Hollow Soul
relics.description: At the start of combat, shuffle a Void into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: You never knew how important it was to you until it was gone.

relics.name: Iron Pot Helmet
relics.description: When you play a Defend, gain 3 Block.
relics.flavorText: It once was special and enchanted. Now it's just a big hunk of metal.

relics.name: Jade Idol
relics.description:
On pick-up add a Wind Strike to your deck.
The first Strike you play each combat is played twice.
relics.flavorText: Immaculately carved, and defying physics just one of these with little effort becomes very powerful given time.

relics.name: Louse War Banner
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 10 Curl Up. When Curl Up is triggered, Block is not lost that turn.
relics.flavorText: Be one with the bug.

relics.name: Lucky
relics.description: At the start of the Boss combat of this Battle Tower, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Those who give back to the less fortunate always find themselves rewarded somehow.

relics.name: Nob War Banner
relics.description: The first 3 enemy actions each combat that are not attacks grant you 1 Strength. Start each combat with 2 Weak.
relics.flavorText: RRrroohrrRGHHhhh!!

relics.name: Otto's Deck
relics.description: Upon pickup, replace your basic Strikes and Defends with Pawn's Advances. Obtain a random Uncommon and Rare Chess Card.
relics.flavorText: Otto's deck is chess themed. Hm.

relics.name: Promise of Gold
relics.description: Gain 100 gold when you defeat the Battle Tower boss.
relics.flavorText: It will all be worth it.

relics.name: Queen's Pawn
relics.description:
If the first and last card you play in a turn is an Attack, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
If the first and last card you play in a turn is a Skill, gain 5 Block.
relics.flavorText: The most important and loyal of pieces.

relics.name: Ruby Fragment
relics.description: Once per combat, after dealing 15 unblocked damage in a combat, gain [E] and draw 2 cards.
relics.flavorText: Just a shard of the Justicar's power, seems offence will be rewarded by his divine.

relics.name: Scary Nail
relics.description: You have 1 additional Strength for every enemy in combat.
relics.flavorText: Taken out of the Totem, this would fit great into a baseball bat.

relics.name: Sentry Core
relics.description: At the start of every odd turn, deal 9 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: An ominous energy still pulses inside, long after removing it.

relics.name: Slime-Filled Flask
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a Slime Elixir to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Is this even safe to drink?

relics.name: Snecko War Banner
relics.description: Start each combat Confused. Draw 3 cards at the start of the first turn of combat.
relics.flavorText: This pattern. It's... mesmerizing.

relics.name: Steelbound Codex
relics.description: Whenever you spend [E] [E] [E] on Attacks in one turn, your next Attack costs 0.
relics.flavorText: Ok Intellij, why do you want to autocorrect "Steelbound" to "Spellbound"?!?

relics.name: Sweaty Armband
relics.description: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: No pain, no gain.

relics.name: Torch
relics.description: While in the Battle Tower, at the start of combat, shuffle 2 copies of your chosen card into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: A simple torch that glows with an emerald fire. It seems to weaken the further it travels.

relics.name: Mending Plumage
relics.description: Whenever you play a card, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: The Plumage merges with your feathers and makes you feel ...

relics.name: Throat Lozenge
relics.description: Ignore the first beaked:Wither effect each combat.
relics.flavorText: Soothing relief! Not for reuse.

relics.name: Shiny Bauble
relics.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with 1 Ritual.
relics.flavorText: You no take my shiny.

relics.name: Blessed Coat
relics.description: Replaces Mending Plumage. Upon playing a card, heal 1 HP. Every time you play 3 cards in a single turn, gain 1 Regen.
relics.flavorText: A protective alternative to fur.

relics.name: Flawless Sticks
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Exhaust all beaked:Depleted cards.
relics.flavorText: A bundle of surprisingly beautiful sticks.

relics.name: Maw Fillet
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Shop spaces are replaced with Elite spaces.
relics.flavorText: The stench attracts the hungriest, repels the wealthiest.

relics.name: Sacred Deck
relics.description: Upon pick up, choose ANY card of any color to obtain.
relics.flavorText: Contains the deepest secrets of all who have entered the Spire.

relics.name: Sacred Necklace
relics.description:
Super-Rare!
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
relics.flavorText: A sparkling trinket from an exotic land...

relics.name: Sacrifice Doll
relics.description: On the first turn of each combat, play your entire hand on random targets at no cost.
relics.flavorText: This doll reminds you of a certain...robot. You feel as if it's always watching over you.

relics.name: Ritual Plumage
relics.description: If you end your turn without playing any cards, gain 2 Ritual. Only works once per combat.
relics.flavorText: The Strength of a Demon courses through you.

relics.name: Ancient Meteorite
relics.description:
Upon pickup, raise your maximum hand size by 2.
At the start of your turn, lose [E][E] and draw cards until your hand is full.
relics.flavorText: Food for a giant green dragon, not for you!

relics.name: Cheese Board
relics.description:
Upon pickup gain 1 Potion Slot.
All hallway fights now give a bonus potion reward, even special rarity ones.
Potions are 40% stronger, with their potency increasing by at least 1.
Potions grant 1 Max HP on use.
relics.flavorText: Includes a wine glass to put a potion in! The meal complements your potions perfectly.

relics.name: Curse of the Peglin King
relics.description:
bundlecore:Rare.
Upon pickup, gain 1 Potion Slot.
At the start of your turn, add a Miracle to the top of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Half of the time you feel full of energy, half of the time you feel slow. This odd artifact also has a slot in the back for a night cap.

relics.name: Defresh Potion
relics.description:
bundlecore:Rare
Upon pickup, raise your maximum hand size by 1.
At the start of your turn, gain [E][E] and draw 2 cards.
ALL CARDS EXHAUST.
relics.flavorText: As you drink from the potion you feel your memory begin to fade... It never returns...

relics.name: Cheese Scone
relics.description:
Upon pickup gain 2 Max HP.
At the start of combat gain 2 Temporary Strength and 1 Temporary Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Is it a cake, biscuit or sponge?

relics.name: Coconut
relics.description:
Gain 4 Max HP on pickup.
Gain 1 potion slot on pickup.
relics.flavorText: A delightful fruit from a place far warmer than the Spire. Its shell can carry a potion after consuming the fruit.

relics.name: Darkling Jelly
relics.description:
Gain 4 Max HP on pickup.
Each time you deal Fatal damage during combats with 2 or more enemies, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: Sticky Jelly made from the goo of Darklings. You seem to understand how to extract vitality from groups of creatures after eating it.

relics.name: Foxnut
relics.description:
Gain 4 Max HP on pickup.
At the start of combat draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Sourced not from trees but the miracle springs, these nuts are sweet and provide miraculous bursts of swiftness.

relics.name: Lemon Float
relics.description:
Gain 2 Max HP on pickup.
At the start of your second turn, draw 2 cards.
relics.flavorText: A frosty citrussy float. once you get past the initial coldness it, provides a zingy swiftness.

relics.name: Snake™ Bubbles
relics.description:
Heal 12 HP and gain 2 Max HP on pickup.
At the start of turn 3 draw 2 cards.
relics.flavorText: Now with an added pop! Snake™ managed to replicate the flavour of the Snakefruit and add them to this tea! It has sold much better than the now very expensive boxed variety.

relics.name: Apple Pie
relics.description:
Gain 5 Max HP on pickup.
Whenever you play a Power, gain 1 Temporary HP.
relics.flavorText: Apples from a faraway land were baked into a divine pastry and provide a long lasting source of vitality.

relics.name: Cured Jaw Worm
relics.description:
Gain 3 Max HP on pickup.
At the start of every odd turn, gain 1 Strength.
Can be cooked at Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: The cured tongue of a slain Jaw Worm, its toughness still remains.

relics.name: Joja Cola
relics.description:
Gain 2 Max HP and heal 2 HP on pickup.
At the start of your third turn, gain [E].
relics.flavorText: Hailing from a farming community, this drink seems questionable at best in most ways.

relics.name: Lemon Snucks
relics.description:
Upon pickup gain 7 Max HP.
The next relic in a chest you see will be lost, but you will gain 17 more Max HP.
relics.flavorText: A citygoers favourite thing to pair with Snake™ as the lemon flavour helps compliment the subtle nuttyness of the Snake™.

relics.name: Pomegranate Daiquiri
relics.description:
Lose 7 Max HP on pickup.
At the end of your turn, for every 2 Skills in your hand, draw 1 card next turn.
relics.flavorText: An unusual drink that can help refine technique retention. Its alcohol content, however makes it somewhat toxic to the Spire's denizens.

relics.name: Shellard Spaghetti
relics.description:
Gain 2 Max HP on pickup.
At the start of combat gain 1 Metallicize per Power in your deck, but lose 1 Metallicize per Power played.
relics.flavorText: With a whole Lavagullin claw! It seems to make your techniques provide a steely posture that fades in the heat of battle.

relics.name: Awoken Cake
relics.description:
LOSE up to 6 HP on pickup.
The first time each turn you Exhaust a card, gain 1 Strength.
Mazaleth will be angry.
relics.flavorText: Despite its appearance, this cake is actually very small because the Cultists say their leader can't eat too much sugar at once. The guilt of eating someone else's cake is painful.

relics.name: Baked Sweet Potato
relics.description:
Upon pickup gain 5 Max HP.
Once per turn you may left click this relic's Button to discard a card in hand then draw a card randomly from your discard pile.
relics.flavorText: A somewhat sweet, cooked vegetable that helps you remember things later.

relics.name: Chilli Dog
relics.description: Upon pickup gain 4 Max HP, if you play 10 cards in one turn apply 1 Slow to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Rumour has it that this relic's Recipe arrived from a mysterious swirling portal in the red-mask district, but most citygoers are too afraid of the red gang to check it out.

relics.name: Collectors Mints
relics.description:
Gain 4 Max HP on pickup.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 3 unique Orbs, gain 1 Focus.
relics.flavorText: A unique brand of mints produced by the Collector, each mint has a different flavour. Perhaps your [ORB] should be, too?

relics.name: Hexacakes
relics.description:
Gain 6 Max HP on pickup.
When you play a power, gain 1 Mantra. The first time you play 6 Powers each combat, gain 4 Mantra.
relics.flavorText: Spicy and warm, these cakes bring bursts of divine and ethereal energy. Favoured by a certain ghost.

relics.name: Hot Chocolate
relics.description:
Gain 2 Max HP and heal 50% of your Max HP on pickup.
Upgrade the first 3 unupgraded cards drawn each combat.
relics.flavorText: A sweet drink from the Brass Tundra, it is seemingly a peaceful beverage.

relics.name: Nob Jerky
relics.description:
Gain 4 Max HP on pickup.
Whenever you play 15 Skills during combat, gain 1 Enrage.
relics.flavorText: Smoked meat from a Gremlin Nob. Eating it fills you with an indescribable anger.

relics.name: Ominous Oatcakes
relics.description:
Gain 14 Max HP on pickup.
When you play a Fleeting card, obtain an Un-upgraded copy of the card and lose 1 Max HP that increases by 1 with each use.
relics.flavorText: These strange biscuits seem to be departing from our world, eat them quickly!.. or don't?

relics.name: Passionfruit
relics.description:
Gain 8 Max HP on pickup.
At the end of your turn draw 2 cards next turn per Power in your hand.
relics.flavorText: A powerful fruit from the jungles, its sour tang can bring swiftness to unrealised techniques.

relics.name: Pineapple Sorbet
relics.description:
Gain 1 Max HP on pickup.
At the end of your turn draw 1 more next turn card per card in your hand over 5.
relics.flavorText: The refreshing pineapple sorbet hails from a land extremely far from the spire. Consuming it can help retain one's skill over time.

relics.name: Slaver Sliders
relics.description:
Gain 4 Max HP on pickup.
At the start of combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Now with Snecko's special sauce.

relics.name: Snake™
relics.description:
Heal to full on pickup.
The first time you play a Power each combat gain 4 Accuracy and 4 Mallable.
relics.flavorText: It used to be popular in the city, but when Snake Plants were bewitched by the Collector, the stonks of this tea brand collapsed.

relics.name: Cooked Jaw Worm
relics.description:
Gain 5 Max HP on cooking.
At the start of your turn, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Now cooked with the few herbs found in the spire, this flavourful meal carries strong vitality and power.

relics.name: Banana Energy
relics.description:
Gain 00000111 Max HP on pickup.
When you evoke 1 orb, gain [E] and increase the threshold by 1 this turn.
relics.flavorText: Now with real energy! Might actually be circuit lubricant.

relics.name: Blighted Watermelon
relics.description:
Lose 25% Max HP on pickup.
At the start of combat, gain bundle_of_food:Watermelon_Buffs .
relics.flavorText: While it is still edible the Watermelon preserves much of the ichor and toxin of its taint.

relics.name: Brick of Exxod
relics.description:
Lose 25% of your Max HP on pickup.
At the start of your turn, draw 2 cards.
If you play 60 cards in one turn, Obtain Truest Power.
relics.flavorText: As soon as you look at it you get an overwhelming feeling... INFINITE POWER?!?!? I MUST EAT IT. ALL OF IT?!?!

relics.name: Cultist's Chair Cookie
relics.description:
Gain 7 Max HP on pickup.
At the start of combat, gain 1 Ritual, 1 Strength and 1 Curiosity.
relics.flavorText: Strange cookies that ominously pulsate, they give you an uncanny urge to dab.

relics.name: Cursed Walnut
relics.description:
Gain 3 Max HP on pickup.
At the start of your turn, gain [E] [E] but lose 2 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: A walnut that only grows ontop of mass graves, its screaming shell will petrify the wielder unless they learn to handle its immense power.

relics.name: Delicious Donu
relics.description:
Gain 11 Max HP on pickup.
At the start of your turn gain [E], Donu will arrive in every elite room and get stronger the higher you climb.
Donu will be your destiny.
relics.flavorText: A forsaken treat that appears to be an effigy of a powerful creature found within the spire, such creature draws hatred towards it so consume at your own peril.

relics.name: Dragonfruit
relics.description:
Gain 8 Max HP on pickup.
At the start of your turn, lose [E] but draw 3 additional cards.
Gain 2 Vigor when playing a card.
After playing 7 cards gain 1 more Vigor per card each turn.
relics.flavorText: A fruit bearing overwhelming power, it hastens and invigorates the wielder so much it consumes much of their natural stamina.

relics.name: Eggplant
relics.description:
Gain 11 Max HP on pickup.
Whenever you play a power gain 1 Dexterity and 1 Metallicize.
relics.flavorText: Remarkably well preserved from the spireblight, the Eggplant is big and hard with a salty and bitter flavour.

relics.name: Frosted Eclair
relics.description:
Upon pickup gain 8 Max HP.
At the start of turn 3 gain 5 Strength.
relics.flavorText: A strange oblong pastry with a sweet chocolate frosting... filled with sweet, sticky, creamy white goodness! I want another one! - Ranwid

relics.name: Fruit Salad
relics.description:
When you climb a floor gain 1 Max HP.
Gain bundle_of_food:Fruity_Buffs related to each fruit in the bowl.
relics.flavorText: A confused and chaotic cacophony of fruits put together into a bowl with cursed, oddly green cream.

relics.name: Pickle Pizza
relics.description:
Gain 5 Max HP on pickup. Negate the negative effects of Weak and Frail.
Weak increases attack damage by 12.5%, Frail increases Block gain by 12.5%, Vulnerable now provides 40% block versus incoming damage.
relics.flavorText: Why? Well, because pickles seem to cure most ailments found in the Spire. Most of the Spire's denizens hate its taste, though.

relics.name: Snecko Stew
relics.description:
Gain ? Max HP on pickup.
When you play a card, draw and discard 3 cards randomly. If you drew cards this way, randomize the cost of all cards in your hand and decrease the effect by 1 card this turn.
relics.flavorText: Featuring two Snecko feet, this dubious looking stew confers bizarre and unexpected energy and swiftness. Lick with caution.

relics.name: Top Hat
relics.description: If your hand is full when drawing a card, draw an extra card next turn instead.
relics.flavorText: This stylish hat can also be used to store rabbits and excess cards.

relics.name: Bottled Yo-Yo
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. When it is put into your discard pile, shuffle it into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Yo, yo.

relics.name: Decoder Ring
relics.description: When you play 3 Attacks, then 2 Skills, then 2 Attacks, then 1 Skill, deal 30 damage to all enemies.
relics.flavorText: Up, up, down, down, left, right, left, right, B, A.

relics.name: Deflated Dodgeball
relics.description: You have a 10% chance to dodge attacks.

relics.name: Dentures
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power, add a copy of it to your discard pile 50% of the time.
relics.flavorText: You don't know what elderly monster these belonged to.

relics.name: Flyswatter
relics.description: At future Card Reward screens you will no longer be offered cards that you have previously skipped.
relics.flavorText: There are insects all over inside the spire. This swatter only works for the small ones.

relics.name: Boomerang
relics.description: Place the first Attack card you play each turn on top of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Always comes back to you.

relics.name: Gift Box
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and add 1 rare card to your deck.
relics.flavorText: It could be anything.

relics.name: Glowing Rock
relics.description: At the end of your turn you may Exhaust a card from your hand.
relics.flavorText: It is slightly warm to the touch.

relics.name: Ice Cream Scoop
relics.description: You can rearrange your Orbs by dragging them.
relics.flavorText: Makes nice spheres.

relics.name: Infinite Journal
relics.description: Cards can be upgraded any number of times.
relics.flavorText: It just goes on forever.

relics.name: Royal Goblet
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
Draw 1 fewer card each turn.
relics.flavorText: Fit to serve a king. Or maybe made from cheap plastic.

relics.name: Runic Octahedron
relics.description: Draw 1 fewer card each turn. Every time you play 2 cards in a single turn, draw a card.
relics.flavorText: The runes are indecipherable.

relics.name: Severed Torchhead
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
Whenever you play an Attack, lose 1 Dexterity for the turn.
Whenever you play a Skill, lose 1 Strength for the turn.
relics.flavorText: The flame has died, so the owner will not miss it.

relics.name: Slow Cooker
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
On the first turn of combat lose 2 Energy instead.
relics.flavorText: Allows you to prepare a hearty spire-stew. Not for the impatient.

relics.name: Special Sausage
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose to start each combat with 2 Strength, 2 Dexterity, or 2 Focus.
relics.flavorText: Found lying around the spire. Should be safe to eat.

relics.name: Treasure Map
relics.description: The map now shows what relics can be found in treasure and elite rooms.
relics.flavorText: X marks the spot.

relics.name: Abyssal Orb
relics.description: At the start of your turn, apply 1 Abysstouched to a random enemy. Whenever you apply Abysstouched, apply 1 additional Abysstouched.
relics.flavorText: It gazes back at you.

relics.name: Bag of Tricks
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 After Image. Draw 1 less card on the first turn of each combat.
relics.flavorText: Trick or treat!

relics.name: Bean Sprouts
relics.description:
Whenever you gain Frail or Vulnerable, or lose Dexterity due to an enemy, gain 1 Strength and 5 Block.
You gain this even if Turnip prevents the Frail.
relics.flavorText: They go well with everything.

relics.name: Black Card
relics.description: Shop prices are reduced by 30%. Whenever you enter a shop room, gain 2 Corruption.
relics.flavorText: For the truly elite, by invitation only.

relics.name: Blighted Spirefruit
relics.description: Upon pickup, reduce your Max HP by 4. Start each combat with 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Infected with the Spireblight, but maybe eat it anyway?

relics.name: Bottled Prism
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card of a different color. Start each combat with this card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: The interaction of the bottle and the prism inside it creates fascinating rainbows.

relics.name: Bottomless Mead Horn
relics.description:
Based on the size of your deck:
20+: At the start of combat, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.
30+: At the start of combat, Exhaust 1 Strike and 1 Defend in your draw pile.
40+: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
relics.flavorText: Drink the sea.

relics.name: Burning Ring
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw 1 additional card. At the end of combat, heal 3 HP.
relics.flavorText: Snake design. Maintains a flow of fresh blood.

relics.name: Chthonic Blessing
relics.description:
Gain 15 Gold after every non-Boss combat.
Gain a relic after every 7 non-Boss combats.
Future card rewards have 1 less card to choose from.
relics.flavorText: The riches of the land, accumulated and hoarded.

relics.name: Corrupted Egg
relics.description: Cards in rewards have +33% chance to be upgraded. Gain 1 Corruption every time you gain an upgraded card.
relics.flavorText: Whatever life there once was here has been overtaken by corruption.

relics.name: Corrupted Toolbox
relics.description: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 random corrupted cards and add the chosen card into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Everyone has a price.

relics.name: Deck of Many Fates
relics.description: Add a random card to your hand at the start of one of the first three turns of combat, chosen randomly. The card will be common if on turn one, uncommon if on turn two, and rare if on turn three.
relics.flavorText: The intricately drawn cards feel filled with omens and portents.

relics.name: Doom Sight
relics.description: At the start of your 3rd turn, draw 1 card and apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: There is a future in which I can see only mist and a single shadow.

relics.name: Doom Wing
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power card, gain 2 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: There is a future in which I can see only mist and a single shadow.

relics.name: Fragment of Corruption
relics.description: Small fragment of corrupted Spirestone. Can be used at corrupted Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: Both danger and power.

relics.name: Gnostic Blessing
relics.description:
At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
At the start of each combat, gain 2 Metallicize.
Future card rewards have 1 less card to choose from.
relics.flavorText: The pursuit of knowledge, relentless and deranged.

relics.name: Gohei
relics.description: Whenever you would receive 10 or more unblocked Attack damage, receive 5 less and add a Wound to your discard pile.
relics.flavorText: This tasseled rod cleanses and protects.

relics.name: Hand of Midas
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Elites drop 175 Gold instead of a relic.
relics.flavorText: Makes it hard to eat and drink.

relics.name: Harbinger's Claw
relics.description: Corruption increases your attack damage by the same percent that it increases enemy attack damage.
relics.flavorText: The claw of an otherworldly horror.

relics.name: Harbinger's Skull
relics.description: If you do not play any Powers during your turn, gain 3 Block at the end of your turn and draw 1 additional card at the start of your next turn.
relics.flavorText: The skull of an otherworldly horror.

relics.name: Heavy Sword
relics.description: At the start of your 4th turn, gain 3 Strength.
relics.flavorText: It was too big to be called a sword. Massive, thick, heavy, and far too rough. Indeed, it was a heap of raw iron.

relics.name: Hideous Statue
relics.description: After every 3 combats, receive a corrupted potion reward.
relics.flavorText: A large stone statue of a creature you hope to never see.

relics.name: Mask of Nightmares
relics.description: Whenever you enter a corrupted room, raise your Max HP by 2.
relics.flavorText: Every glimpse is disturbing, in new way each time.

relics.name: Mystifying Timepiece
relics.description: If you do not play any cards that cost 0 during your turn, draw 1 additional card at the start of your next turn.
relics.flavorText: The time it keeps doesn't correspond to any system you know.

relics.name: Obsidian Shovel
relics.description: You can now gain corrupted relics at corrupted Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: Made of a special material that absorbs corruption.

relics.name: Ominous Bracelet
relics.description: Reduce Corruption gained from entering rooms by 2. Corrupted events, treasures, and shops no longer give the lowest reward outcomes.
relics.flavorText: A ward that guides its bearer to greatness.

relics.name: Oozing Heart
relics.description: At the start of elite combats, heal 16 HP. Whenever you climb a floor, if you are above 1 HP, lose 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: Slowly leaks, but beats rapidly when danger is near.

relics.name: Rusted Orichalcum
relics.description: At the start of your first 3 turns, gain 11 Block. At the start of combat, gain 3 Constricted.
relics.flavorText: But this metal is supposed to be indestructible....

relics.name: Shimmering Fan
relics.description: When you play cards of 3 different colors in a turn, gain 7 Block.
relics.flavorText: The fan responds to a mix of energies in air around it by defending its bearer.

relics.name: Slime Shield
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Artifact, 1 Metallicize, and 1 Plated Armor, and shuffled 1 Slimed into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Good defense, but very slippery.

relics.name: Transcendent Eye
relics.description: At the start of your 2nd turn, Scry 1 and draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: The creature's eye still seeks out prey.

relics.name: Transcendent Pet
relics.description: At the start of your 2nd turn, apply 1 Vulnerable and 4 Abysstouched to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Surprisingly cute, in a grotesque sort of way.

relics.name: Unreliable Charm
relics.description: At the start of each combat, if the floor number is even, gain 1 Strength and 1 Buffer. If the floor number is odd, gain 1 Dexterity and 1 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: Sometimes it works.

relics.name: Bronze Core
relics.description: The first time you create a Function each combat, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Replace once every 50,000 years.

relics.name: Bronze Gear
relics.description:
The first time you enter guardianmod:Defensive_Mode each combat, gain an additional 10 Block.
Guardian starts the run with a random common Gem.
relics.flavorText: Protection where you need it most.

relics.name: Champion's Crown
relics.description: At the start of combat, enter Defensive or Berserker Stance.
relics.flavorText: A WINNER IS YOU!

relics.name: Heart of Goo
relics.description: Whenever you slimeboundmod:Consume, heal 2 HP, up to 8 each combat.
relics.flavorText: I feel so funky.

relics.name: Mob Leader's Staff
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain [E] , draw 1 card, and Swap to the next Gremlin.
relics.flavorText: Among gremlin mobs, the one with the best horn maintains complete command over the troupe, until another one manages to steal it.

relics.name: Old Locket
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a Memento into your hand.
relics.flavorText: There's a faded picture inside.

relics.name: Snecko Soul
relics.description: The first time you play an sneckomod:Offclass card in a combat, gain [E] and draw a card.

relics.name: Spirit Brand
relics.description: The first time you Ignite a Ghostflame each turn, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: A bound protector.

relics.name: Baalor's Lordly Plate
relics.description: Whenever you guardianmod:Brace, Brace 1 more.
relics.flavorText: One can never have enough armor.

relics.name: Black Powder
relics.description: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies for each hermit:Dead_On effect triggered.
relics.flavorText: Handle with care.

relics.name: Blank Card
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add an gremlin:Echo of a random card from your deck to your hand. It costs 0 .
relics.flavorText: Card Mimic.

relics.name: Brass Tacks
relics.description: Start each combat with 2 Metallicize.
relics.flavorText: The luster on these tacks never seems to fade.

relics.name: Bronze Idol
relics.description:
Status cards now cost [E] and may be played for useful effects.

Slimed -> Lubricant: Draw 2 cards. Exhaust.
Wound -> Grievous Wound: Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Void -> Into the Void: Ethereal. Enemy loses 5 Strength this turn. Whenever this card is drawn, lose 1 Energy. Exhaust.
Dazed -> Daze: Ethereal. Apply 1 Weak. Exhaust.
Burn -> Ignite: Apply 10 :Soulburn. At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.
relics.flavorText: An ancient, weaponised antivirus - who knows who made it, and why?

relics.name: Defensive Thesis
relics.description: Defensive Stance's Finisher Bonus grants 5 more Block.
relics.flavorText: Pro tip: Don't get hit.

relics.name: Dolphin's Style Guide
relics.description: If you end your turn while in no Stance, draw 1 additional card next turn.
relics.flavorText: Author: Renowned explorer and pugilist Dolphin K. Mist.

relics.name: Fragmentation Grenade
relics.description: Damage dealt to random enemies is increased by 3.
relics.flavorText: Nobody dares to ask where the Gremlin got it from.

relics.name: Goop Dweller
relics.description: At the start of combat, slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Bruiser Slime.
relics.flavorText: He followed me home. Can I keep it?

relics.name: Jar of TOBSCo
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 hexamod:Intensity.
relics.flavorText: A little extra heat makes everything better.

relics.name: Loaded Die
relics.description: Cards that choose random numbers have +1 minimum.
relics.flavorText: Cheese-stuffed.

relics.name: Pick of Rhapsody
relics.description: You can now Mine for 2 guardianmod:Gems at Rest Sites (up to 3 times).
relics.flavorText: With as many gemstones that litter the Spire, it is hard to imagine anyone so unlucky to have needed this Pick to aid them.

relics.name: Protective Goggles
relics.description: If you end your turn with no Encoded cards, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: Look closely.

relics.name: Seal of Approval
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 1 of 3 Unidentified Character cards to add to your deck. All future Unidentified Character cards found will be of this character.
relics.flavorText: I'm The Ironclad and this is my favorite Relic in the Spire. -Merchant Advertising Pamphlet

relics.name: Silver Bullet
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a copy of Piercing Shot to your hand. It costs 0 .
relics.flavorText: Spirewolves are long gone.

relics.name: Sneaky Teakwood Match
relics.description: At the start of each combat, hexamod:Ignite the current Ghostflame and hexamod:Advance.
relics.flavorText: Lights on any surface!

relics.name: Supply Scroll
relics.description:
At the start of your 3rd turn, gain a Supply Scroll.
Supply Scroll (0 [E] card): Gain a random assortment of 4 (6) Shivs and Wards. Exhaust.
relics.flavorText: A surprisingly detailed inventory of the mob's various bits and bobbles.

relics.name: Tricky's Bolster-Rod
relics.description: The first time you play a Power card each combat, gain 6 Block and 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Backed by the study of a thousand books. Knowledge is power!

relics.name: Wizard Hat
relics.description: Whenever you consume Wiz, remove a debuff at random.
relics.flavorText: The accompanying robes have long since been stolen.

relics.name: Arumba's Pocket Sentry
relics.description:
At the start of each turn, alternates between:
Deal 7 damage to a random enemy.
Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Sentry Mode active. Target acquired. No hard feelings.

relics.name: Broken Tooth
relics.description: Whenever you beat an Elite encounter, gain 1 Strength at the start of each combat for the rest of the Act.
relics.flavorText: Appears too large to have come from a human jaw...

relics.name: Cable Spool
relics.description: Encode a copy of the first Encodable card you play each combat.
relics.flavorText: Tangled...

relics.name: Deca's Washers
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw 3 additional cards and add a Dazed into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: It is unclear why Deca collects these.

relics.name: Gelatinous Cube
relics.description: Whenever you draw a Status card, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Hey, it stuck to your body.

relics.name: Impeccable Pecs
relics.description:
Whenever you gain Strength, gain an equal amount of Temporary_HP.
Start each combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Glorious.

relics.name: Jeremiah's Banner
relics.description: At the start of combat, slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Leeching Slime and gain 1 Slime slot.
relics.flavorText: You and ooze army.

relics.name: Magic Mallet
relics.description: Whenever you apply Weak, gain 1 Wiz, up to 3 times per turn.
relics.flavorText: Stubs toes twice as hard.

relics.name: Pilot's Codex
relics.description: If you end your turn with no cards in guardianmod:Stasis, choose 1 of 3 cards to place into guardianmod:Stasis.
relics.flavorText: Designs and diagrams of the Spire's earliest manually-driven prototypes, by Master Pilot David.

relics.name: Red Candle
relics.description: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 2 hexamod:Soulburn.
relics.flavorText: Fire BURNS...

relics.name: Ring of the Snek
relics.description: At the start of combat, apply 0-2 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Illegible, unreadable, due by Thursday.

relics.name: Slime Soup
relics.description: When you enter a Rest Site, begin the next combat with a Prepare card that costs 0.
relics.flavorText: Tastes awful, but incredibly healthy.

relics.name: Spyglass
relics.description: If you end your turn hermit:Concentrated, gain an additional [E] next turn .
relics.flavorText: Property of Kestin Highfin.

relics.name: Straight Razor
relics.description: Whenever you remove or Transform a card from your deck, heal 15 HP.
relics.flavorText: For a cleaner shave...

relics.name: Super Snecko Eye
relics.description: Replaces Snecko Eye. At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards. Start each combat Confused. The first time you draw a card that costs 3 each combat, reduce its cost to 0.

relics.name: Wizard Staff
relics.description: Wiz deals 7 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: The pride and joy of every Gremlin Wizard, this staff is a frequent target of theft by rival mobs.

relics.name: Wound Poker
relics.description: At the end of each turn, deal 6 damage to each Weakened enemy.
relics.flavorText: Does it hurt when I do this?.

relics.name: Charred Glove
relics.description: Whenever you draw a Curse, your next attack deals 3 more damage.
relics.flavorText: Parts of the glove still glow with otherworldly cinders.

relics.name: Deflecting Bracers
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain champ:Counter equal to half the amount of expired Block.
relics.flavorText: If you thought blocking was good then...

relics.name: Dueling Glove
relics.description: After using a single-target Attack, if the target has no Vulnerable, apply 1 Vulnerable.
relics.flavorText: Count from ten...

relics.name: Frost Primer
relics.description: All Functions you create gain Retain.
relics.flavorText: 22 ounces of the chemical compound Ar22, shelf life: 22 years. Best stored in a mahogany fridge.

relics.name: Gemstone Gun
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 3 guardianmod:Gems. At the start of each combat, gain a card with Retain, Exhaust, and each chosen Gem socketed.
relics.flavorText: Bang! Bang! Bang! Hey, I matched three!

relics.name: Gladiators Manual
relics.description: Whenever you play a Combo, a Finisher, and enter a Stance in the same turn, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Try everything - something will stick.

relics.name: Gremlin Bomb
relics.description: Whenever a Gremlin dies, deal 30 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Gremlins have an uncanny knack for finding dangerous things. Sometimes, they even survive looting them.

relics.name: Gremlin Gravestone
relics.description: Dead Gremlins can be Resurrected at Rest Sites as a Free Action.
relics.flavorText: Where do gremlins go when they die? Not bloody far enough.

relics.name: Horseshoe
relics.description: Whenever you gain Weak, Frail or Vulnerable, gain 1 less.
relics.flavorText: Lucky charm. Somebody is gonna be missing this.

relics.name: Mallet
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add 2 copies of Fine Tuning+ to your hand.
relics.flavorText: That's it! I'm gettin me mallet!

relics.name: Prickly Shields
relics.description: Whenever you gain Block, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: Gremlins use whatever scraps they can find as weapons or armor. Some serve as both.

relics.name: Red Scarf
relics.description: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain 2 Block.
relics.flavorText: It's warm and fuzzy.

relics.name: Rye Stalk
relics.description: At the start of each combat, all enemies lose 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Still in mint condition, despite being chewed on for so long.

relics.name: Sack of Gems
relics.description: Upon pickup, add 5 random guardianmod:Gems to your deck.
relics.flavorText: Ooh... shiny!

relics.name: Signature Finisher
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a Finisher. This Finisher costs 0, can be used without a Stance, and never causes your Stance to be exited.
relics.flavorText: And now, it's time for my ULTIMATE MOVE!

relics.name: Six-Point Brand
relics.description: Whenever you play 6 cards, deal 6 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: Fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, FIRE!

relics.name: Slimed Tail
relics.description: When you fall below 50% of your Maximum HP, slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Guerilla Slime, and the next time you take damage, your leading slime is slimeboundmod:Absorbed instead. (works once per combat).
relics.flavorText: A fake tail to trick enemies during combat, completely covered in slime.

relics.name: Slimy Skull
relics.description: Whenever you apply slimeboundmod:Goop, apply an additional 1 slimeboundmod:Goop.
relics.flavorText: A Snecko skull in absolutely awful condition. Unclean and slimy, dirt and grime stick to it like glue.

relics.name: Snake-Charmer's Flute
relics.description: sneckomod:Muddled cards can't cost 3.
relics.flavorText: Sssssss...

relics.name: Soul of Chaos
relics.description:
The fourth Ghostflame becomes a Mayhem Ghostflame.
Mayhem Ghostflame activates when you end your turn on it.
Ignition: Play the top card of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Mayhem, made manifest.

relics.name: Spectre's Hand
relics.description: Whenever you Enter a Stance, gain a basic Strike or Defend. It costs 0 and has Exhaust.
relics.flavorText: Some victories stay with you.

relics.name: Stone of Nomakk
relics.description: At the start of combat, Split into a slimeboundmod:Mire Slime and gain 1 slimeboundmod:Potency.
relics.flavorText: When presented to one of your Goop Gang, it seems to make the blob dance.

relics.name: Thermal Stone
relics.description: If hexamod:Soulburn detonates, heal 4 HP at the end of combat.
relics.flavorText: A fire would liven this thing up!

relics.name: Unidentified Egg
relics.description:
Identifying becomes a free action.
Unidentified cards in card rewards are Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: What will hatch? Pay $1000 to see.

relics.name: Bandit Contract
relics.description: At the start of the 3rd boss combat, Red Mask Bandits will assist you.
relics.flavorText: An agreement from the Bandit trio - partially in exchange for a trinket, but mostly in exchange for their lives.

relics.name: Bandit Contract+
relics.description: At the start of the 3rd boss combat, Red Mask Bandits will assist you.
relics.flavorText: An agreement from the Bandit trio - partially in exchange for a trinket, but mostly in exchange for their lives.

relics.name: Black Knight's Helm
relics.description:
The first time you enter each Stance each combat:
Defensive: Gain 2 Dexterity and lose 1 Strength.
Berserker: Gain 2 Strength and lose 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Only a flesh wound.

relics.name: Bottled Code
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card with Encode. Start each combat with this card Encoded.
relics.flavorText: Actually, I have code for that exact thing...

relics.name: Broken Wing Statue
relics.description: The cultists that worship the Awakened One will be interested in this.
relics.flavorText: A broken hunk of a once-magnificent statue.

relics.name: Coat of Many Faces
relics.description: Upon pickup, gain Cultist Headpiece, Face Of Cleric, N'loth's Hungry Face, Gremlin Visage, and Ssserpent Head.
relics.flavorText: It was Steve, and Bill, and Ian, and Fred, and John...

relics.name: Emerald Heart Blessing
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: The heart is everything.

relics.name: Extra Cursed Bell
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain 2 of a unique Curse and 3 relics.
relics.flavorText: You think you hear it echoing, but can never confirm it.

relics.name: Extra Cursed Key
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Whenever you open a non-Boss chest, obtain 2 Curses.
relics.flavorText: Locked away for good reason.

relics.name: Greed Ooze
relics.description:
At the start of combat, spawn Greed Ooze.
At Rest Sites, Greed Ooze will take 50 of your souls, increasing its damage by 1.
When Greed Ooze is absorbed gain Revive Greed.
Revive Greed (2 (1) [E] ): Retain. Split into Greed Ooze. Exhaust.
relics.flavorText: A friend found in the Spire who devours souls.

relics.name: Gremlin Sack
relics.description: Upon pickup, add 6 cards to your deck from the Match Game.
relics.flavorText: The Gremlin and his bodyguard were no match for you.

relics.name: Inner Strength
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: It's about the gigantic sword in your heart.

relics.name: Knowing Skull
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a **Knowing Skull** to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Put me down!

relics.name: Mystical Octahedron
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card that selects a random number for its effects. This card always selects its maximum possible number.
relics.flavorText: It appears weighted toward one side.

relics.name: Neow's Blessing
relics.description:
Upon pickup, increase your Maximum HP by 100.
Increase your Maximum HP by 100 at the start of each Act.
Lose all your Potion slots.
Draw 1 less card and lose [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Ease your rage. Be as tough and unyielding as the Spire itself.

relics.name: New Challenger
relics.description: Start each combat in a random Champ Stance.
relics.flavorText: Can you take the crown?

relics.name: Paradox Artifact
relics.description: At the start of each turn, add a random card with Encode to your hand and give it Ethereal.
relics.flavorText: You've never seen a coding frenzy like this before.

relics.name: Quantum Chamber
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. Start each combat with this card removed from your deck. At the start of your 4th turn, return it and 2 copies of it to your hand.
relics.flavorText: You get the chicken by hatching the egg, not by smashing it.

relics.name: Ruby Heart Blessing
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: The heart is strong.

relics.name: Sapphire Heart Blessing
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10.
relics.flavorText: The heart is pleased.

relics.name: Scrap Ooze
relics.description:
At the start of combat, spawn Scrap Ooze (can be revived if Absorbed).
At Rest Sites, you can donate a card to the Scrap Ooze, modifying its damage:
+1 damage for Uncommons
+2 damage for Rares
-1 damage for Commons
-2 damage for Curses

relics.name: Sharpened Fragment
relics.description: At the start of each turn, gain a Crystal Shiv.
relics.flavorText: Once a broken statue - now a makeshift weapon.

relics.name: Teleport Stone
relics.description: You may skip any number of rooms the next time you move, but cannot move into a Boss Room.
relics.flavorText: Never leave home without it.

relics.name: The Broken Seal
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10, then heal all of your HP. Start each combat with 2 Strength, 2 Dexterity, and 2 hexamod:Intensity. You can not receive The Broken Seal again.
relics.flavorText: Unlimited, unrestrained, unquenchable power.

relics.name: The Heart's Malice
relics.description: Enemies in your first 3 combats will flee in terror.
relics.flavorText: The malice of corruption bestowed by the Heart.

relics.name: Wheel of Change
relics.description: At each Rest Site, you may spin the wheel once. Choosing to collect its reward uses up this relic.
relics.flavorText: No one gets two spins, he says.

relics.name: Young Snecko
relics.description: Deals 5 damage to a random enemy at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Bewilderingly adorable.

relics.name: Black Heart of Goo
relics.description:
Replaces Heart of Goo.
Whenever you slimeboundmod:Consume, heal 3 HP, up to 15 each combat.
relics.flavorText: The Secret of the Ooze.

relics.name: Clasped Locket
relics.description: Replaces Old Locket. First time you draw a curse each turn, Exhaust it and draw 2 cards. Upon pickup, obtain 2 Injuries.
relics.flavorText: It won't open anymore.

relics.name: Dented Plate
relics.description: While your HP is at or below 50%, gain [E] and draw 1 card at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Several bullets are still lodged inside.

relics.name: Electromagnetic Coil
relics.description: Functions are now made up of 4 cards.
relics.flavorText: An inefficient but entertaining power source.

relics.name: Gremlin Leader's Voucher
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Upon pickup, permanently lose a Gremlin.Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Upon pickup, permanently lose a Gremlin.
relics.flavorText: IOU 1 Gremlin

relics.name: Guardian Gear
relics.description:
Replaces Bronze Gear.
Begin each combat in guardianmod:Defensive_Mode, which persists for 3 turns.
relics.flavorText: Replace every 3,000 floors.

relics.name: Idol of Retromation
relics.description: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of the most expensive card in your hand by 1 for this turn.
relics.flavorText: Often called the Idol of Reto for short.

relics.name: Lucky Horseshoe
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 1 of 3 Unidentified Character cards. Add 5 copies of it to your deck. All combats drop an additional card reward of the chosen character's cards.
relics.flavorText: Make your own luck.

relics.name: Makeshift Battery
relics.description: Gain [E] and add a Slimed into your discard pile at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: It's an 8.9 volt.

relics.name: Mark of the Ether
relics.description:
Replaces Spirit Brand.
The first time you Ignite a Ghostflame each turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Let’s see if we can do... better.

relics.name: Mob Leader's Crown
relics.description:
Replaces Mob Leader's Staff.
The first time you shuffle your draw pile each turn, gain [E] , draw 1 card, and Swap to the next Gremlin.
relics.flavorText: The fancier the symbol of office, the more likely it is to be stolen.

relics.name: Platinum Core
relics.description:
Replaces Bronze Core.
The first 3 Functions you create each combat cost 0 until played.
relics.flavorText: Changelog: Improved user experience.

relics.name: Power Armor
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Your maximum Vigor and champ:Counter is 10.
relics.flavorText: Bought used.

relics.name: Short Stature
relics.description: The first time a Gremlin would die each combat, heal it to 75% of your Max HP instead.
relics.flavorText: It is easy to get away with mischief if you are literally beneath their notice.

relics.name: Shotglass
relics.description: First 2 times you use a potion each combat, gain a random potion. You can only use 2 potions each combat.
relics.flavorText: Any liquid placed inside changes into something else.

relics.name: Super Snecko Soul
relics.description:
Replaces Snecko Soul[].
The first time you play an sneckomod:Offclass each turn, gain [E] .

relics.name: Tarr Blob
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, lose 1 Slime slot.
relics.flavorText: The bad kind of Slime.

relics.name: Tiny Bowler Hat
relics.description: At the start of combat, add a Study the Spire card to your hand. It costs 0.
relics.flavorText: Whosoever controls the hat, controls the Spire.

relics.name: Victorious Crown
relics.description:
Replaces Champion's Crown.
Start each combat in champ:Ultimate Stance, which lasts for 1 turn.
relics.flavorText: Conglaturation!! You are the greatest winner.

relics.name: Wander Bots
relics.description:
On pickup, lose 2 Stasis slots.
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: These drones find the most wonderful salvage, but require processing power to maintain.

relics.name: Xanatos' Icy Charm
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. hexamod:Soulburn takes 4 turns to activate.
relics.flavorText: I feel... cold.

relics.name: Barbell
relics.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, if you have at least 10 Upgradable cards in your deck, Upgrade one at random.
relics.flavorText: 1000 reps? Psh. I can do 1001.

relics.name: Berserker's Guide
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain 3 Vigor.
relics.flavorText: The text is illegible.

relics.name: Bottled Anomaly
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. At the start of each combat, remove it from your draw pile. At the start of turn 3, add it into your hand. It costs 0.
relics.flavorText: Swirling and swirling and finally breaking.

relics.name: Bottled Black Hole
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. Start each combat with this card in guardianmod:Stasis.
relics.flavorText: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

relics.name: Cryo Chamber
relics.description: Gain 1 Stasis slot. Whenever a card enters guardianmod:Stasis, Upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: Things always seem better coming out than they did going in.

relics.name: Donu's Washers
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain [E] [E] and add 1 Void into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: It is rather clear why Donu collects these.

relics.name: Olexa's Shield
relics.description: Swap the positions of the Bolstering Ghostflame and the first Searing Ghostflame.
relics.flavorText: Protection on-demand.

relics.name: Pet Ghost
relics.description: First time you would die each combat, survive with 1 HP instead.
relics.flavorText: Poor guy.

relics.name: Protective Gear
relics.description: Reduce the damage you take from slimeboundmod:Tackles by 3.
relics.flavorText: The best defense is a good offense.

relics.name: Rare Booster Box
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain a Unidentified Rare card of each card type.
relics.flavorText: Mint condition.

relics.name: Recycler
relics.description: The first time an non-Status and non-Curse Ethereal card is Exhausted each combat, add a copy to your hand that costs 0 until played.
relics.flavorText: One day, it shall be recycled too.

relics.name: Sleeved Ace
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain a Pure Luck with Retain.
relics.flavorText: We're all aces.

relics.name: Stolen Merchandise
relics.description:
Whenever you Swap, gain an Echo of a random Colorless card.
At the start of combat, the Merchant gains 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: "Blasted, thieving Gremlins!".

relics.name: Tag Teamwork
relics.description:
Whenever you draw Tag Team, draw another card.
Upon pickup, add two copies of Tag Team to your deck.
relics.flavorText: Teamwork makes the dream work.

relics.name: Curse Brand
relics.description: Whenever you draw a Curse, Awaken a random card.
relics.flavorText: This mark is reserved for the failed and fallen.

relics.name: Darksteel Hammer
relics.description: Whenever you obtain a Curse, Upgrade a random card.
relics.flavorText: This blacksmith's tool is steeped in cursed energy.

relics.name: Padlock
relics.description: At the beginning of each combat, you may Seal up to 5 cards from your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: This lock was once used to seal the cage of an evil force.

relics.name: Banana Peel
relics.description: When you are inflicted with Weak, inflict 1 Weak on all enemies.
relics.flavorText: Covered in Go-Kart tracks.

relics.name: Cursed Egg
relics.description: Cleansed Curse reward cards are Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: DO NOT EAT!

relics.name: Jade Seal
relics.description: Whenever you Seal a card, gain 3 Block.
relics.flavorText: An ancient artifact from a forgotten empire.

relics.name: Sticky Barb
relics.description: When you are inflicted with Vulnerable, inflict 1 Vulnerable on all enemies.
relics.flavorText: Impossible to remove from socks.

relics.name: Cursed Locket
relics.description: Increase Blighted inflicted by 50%.
relics.flavorText: Sealed with dark energy, it burns to the touch.

relics.name: Evil Eye
relics.description: After each battle, heal 1 HP for each Curse remaining in your deck.
relics.flavorText: Likes to kick puppies.

relics.name: Lucky Clover
relics.description: At the beginning of each combat, gain 1 Plated Armor for each unique curse in your deck.
relics.flavorText: It's magical and delightful.

relics.name: Neow's Hatred
relics.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, add a Curse that can be cleansed to your deck.
relics.flavorText: It feels like you were brought back just to fail.

relics.name: Death Brand
relics.description: Replaces Curse Brand. Whenever you draw a Curse, Awaken a random card in your hand. Draw an additional card each turn.
relics.flavorText: This brand marks its bearer for execution.

relics.name: Fractured Prism
relics.description: Choose a card in your deck. Your next 5 card rewards will include a copy of that card.
relics.flavorText: The cracked surface creates exactly 5 reflections.

relics.name: Iron Barbs
relics.description: Start each combat with 3 ferrothorn:Scales.
relics.flavorText: Its spikes are harder than steel.

relics.name: Dry Skin
relics.description:
While in ferrothorn:Rain, gain 4 Block at the end of your turn.
If you are in another Weather, lose 2 Block instead.

relics.name: Sand Veil
relics.description: While in ferrothorn:Sandstorm lose 2 Strength but you apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies at the start of your turn.

relics.name: Solar Power
relics.description: While in ferrothorn:Harsh_Sunlight your Attacks deal 4 additional damage, but while in Harsh Sunlight you also lose 1 HP at the end of your turn

relics.name: Drizzle
relics.description: Weather spawns on every Non-Boss combat.

relics.name: Moxie
relics.description: When you deal 14 unblocked damage, draw 1 card.

relics.name: Defeatist
relics.description: If your HP is above 50%, gain [E] at the start of your turn.

relics.name: Rocky Helmet
relics.description:
Replaces Iron Barbs.
Start each combat with 4 Scales and 4 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: The attacker will also be damaged upon contact.

relics.name: Rare Candy
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 6 and chose 1 card to add to your deck.

relics.name: Afternoon Tea
relics.description: Upon resting, gain 5 Regen next combat.
relics.flavorText: There's no point in apologizing for who you are. You are a beautiful person. Please don't apologize for that.

relics.name: Ill Gained Pizza
relics.description: Every time an enemy attacks you, gain 1 Gold.
relics.flavorText: You have to obtain the pizza stealthily. If you don't, everyone will see you. And they will ask for a slice. Everyone wants a piece. Then you're left pizzaless in an unforgiving world.

relics.name: Kosha Piece
